page.title: 19RON HASLAM
page.content: Ron Haslam lives in Smalley on West Meadow Farm. He is a famous motor cycle racer, riding in Grand Prix races all over the world. He won the 1984 World of Sport Superbike Challenge. Ron chose to live on a farm so when he retires he can take up farming. Ron has alot of hobbies one of which is flying his micro-lite aeroplane, taking up people from Smalley. Another hobby is collecting guns. He has over 100 different kinds. Keeping fit is also important for Ron, he plays squash which is a very fast game. He also enjoys playing with his son or programs his computer.
